scripts.livereload-server: echo --Start livereload server-- && python manage.py livereload src static
scripts.start-django-dev: echo --Start django dev server-- && cross-env DEV=True DEBUG=True LOCAL=True python manage.py runserver
scripts.start-django: echo --Start django dev server-- && python manage.py runserver
scripts.check-all: echo --Run all python checkers /autopep8, venv/-- && npm-run-all pyformat pylint
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
